Headline: #50 Damen  temporary Reroute at Damen/Ainslie.
ShortDescription:
50 Damen buses are temp rrtd in both directions via Ashland, Lawrence, and Damen  due to fire department activity near Damen/Ainslie

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Lawrence, and Damen  due to fire department activity near Damen/Ainslie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Jefferson Park due to an earlier mechanical problem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Jefferson Park due to an earlier mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
